name: Looking Back By Elly Heise
description:
Welcome to I.C. Contemporary's third digital exhibition: Looking Back.

For a higher quality experience, we recommend downloading the gallery to your computer.

Whether it be through browser or VR (VR launching on Friday December 11th 2020), immerse yourself into the surrealist wonder of Elly Heise's photography displayed here. Paired with an original soundscape by Matthew Davies, this digital experience places you into a hypnotic realm of mind and  spatial analysis.

Any donations towards this project help fund our artists and build larger and better exhibitions. More information on I.C. Contemporary can be found at www.coltnicastro.com

* DISCLAIMER *

The digital gallery is not operational for mobile use

For the best browser experience use Google Chrome or Mozilla Firefox 

DO NOT USE SAFARI

The program may take some time to load due to the size of the file
